dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3267 IH: Paycheck Relief Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Williams introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the rate of payroll and self-employment taxes, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Paycheck Relief Act of 2015.

subsection.text: Sections 3101(a) and 3111(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 are each amended—

paragraph.text: by striking all that follows section 3121(b)) and inserting a period, and
by striking the following percentages of the wages and inserting 3.1 percent of the wages.
Section 3101(b) of such Code is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking 1.45 percent in paragraph (1) and inserting 0.725 percent, and
by striking 0.9 percent in paragraph (2) and inserting 0.45 percent.

paragraph.text: Section 3111(b) of such Code is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking all that follows section 3121(b)) and inserting a period, and
by striking the following percentages of the wages and inserting 0.725 percent of the wages.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply remuneration paid after December 31, 2015.
Section 1401(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking all that follows for such taxable year and inserting a period, and
by striking the following percent and inserting 6.2 percent.

subsection.text: Section 1401(b) of such Code is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking all that follows for such taxable year in paragraph (1) and inserting a period,
by striking the following percent in paragraph (1) and inserting 1.45 percent, and
by striking 0.9 percent in paragraph (2)(A) and inserting 0.45.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to remuneration received after December 31, 2015.
